data.steps_to_repro: - Ask a friend to upload a .bmp image  - The image won't show in mobile, here is a Imgur link of the photo, <https://imgur.com/gallery/RG9nl> - Also this is not the bug where you can't see embed <(https://trello.com/c/eanfKtSY/731-jpglarge-files-only-show-up-on-mobile>), it is a different one where you can't view the image in android discord
